pages.text: $(item)Rich Soil/$ can be made by leaving $(item)Organic Compost/$ out to dry. $(item)Mushrooms/$, $(item)Water/$, and $(item)The Sun/$ will speed up the process.$(br2)$(item)Rich Soil/$ will increase the speed at which $(bold)$(l:farming/crops)Crops/$ grow, and will also allow $(item)Mushrooms/$ to grow into $(item)Mushroom Colonies/$. $(item)Straw/$ can be obtained by cutting or harvesting $(item)Grass/$, $(item)Wheat/$, or $(item)Rice/$ with a knife.

$(item)Rich Soul Soil/$ behaves in much the same way as $(item)Rich Soil/$, except that it allows $(bold)$(l:farming/nether_crops)Nether Crops/$ to grow when irrigated with $(item)Lava/$.$(br2)In addition, when in complete darkness, $(item)Mimicarnations/$ can sometimes spawn on top of $(item)Rich Soul Soil/$.
